hydra -l <username> -P <password_file> -: Brute force a service with a list of usernames and passwords.
Brute force a service on a specific port.
Set a timeout for the brute force attempt.
Set the number of threads for the brute force attempt.
Specify a module to use for the brute force attempt.
Specify a subnet to use for the brute force attempt.
Specify a proxy to use for the brute force attempt.
Specify proxy credentials for the brute force attempt.
Specify a custom HTTP header for the brute force attempt.
Specify a path for digest authentication.
Specify a POST request for the brute force attempt.
Specify a GET request for the brute force attempt.
Specify a GET request for the brute force attempt.
